summary: Inspried by Ahri from League of legends
descriptionHtml:
Required mods
*requires skyrim to be updated to at least 1.8.1*
RacialCompatibility.esm -RaceCompatibility for Dawnguard plus vanilla version upgrades by TMPhoenix
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168
Follow the NMM install of RaceCompatibility and install what YOU are using

Lore:
Pending.........






------------------------------
Installing
drop in
?:\\???\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\data folder
------------------------------
Unistall
?:\\???\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\data Scripts\\AhriRaceController.pex
?:\\???\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\data Scripts\\Source\\AhriRaceController.psc
?:\\???\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\The Kitsune
?:\\???\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\data\\textures\\actors\\character\\The Kitsune
?:\\???\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\data\\The Kitsune.esp


Known Issues:
Human ears are still apart of head-mesh 

Planned Progress
Add the ability to transform into a kitsune

recommended mods:
	
 BFG - Better FaceGen by Radioragae http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953

No More Blocky faces 
No more Blocky faces- No More Blocky Faces-1_50  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30

Alternate Start - Live Another Life by Arthmoor http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168  (USEFUL TO HIDE HUMAN EARS ON AHRI!)

Female Animation Pack by NonokuraSan : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29408

Permissions/Credits
League of legends for everything ahri!!
nothing from LoL is used other then Ahri\'s intellectual existences 

Charismoon
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1186105-charismoon/
For all her help in making this race *howto\'s meshes/textures and more*

T3nd0 
for allowing me to make a skyre version of my race using his race.esp as a plugin(upcoming)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286

Realistic Ragdolls and Force by dDefinder1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/601
(Used skeleton for female) download to get esp if you want to use this mod if not ignore

	
The skeleton of female models by ning999
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/601

I used Perfect for Realistic_Force FIX from download sections
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/41684

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

I used My own Custom Bodyslider settings from this wonderful mod
If you want to change the Female Body for my Custom race simply 
make a body you normal would using body slide but put the nif files here
C:\\Games\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\The Kitsune\\Female\\body

If you using a male body mod just installed it in the normal place as I have males using default location for now.( i think.....lol)

------------------------------
Version list

Update V2 (ITS OUT)
All Human races have Kitsune Version
All spells rebalanced and tweaked, better descriptions added(hint read them)
Essence drain visuals updated and is a spell and not a lesser power
Paralyze is now a spell
No more 25 TIMES mana regen ...it is now 25% not 25 times .......(opps)
Added more racial passives, *muffle,  75* resist disease and poison, + 50 mana, 25% mana regen. 25% in combat heal rate regen.
some more stuffs :D

Release V1 22/01/2013
------------------------------
author: Rayne72 and Charismoon

files.name: The kitsune update (replace esp with this ones esp)
